titleproper.value: Preliminary Inventory to the East Timor and Indonesia Action Network Records <num>TAM 393</num>

publisher.value: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

addressline: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

creation.value: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace <date>2018-05-29T15:12:35</date>

corpname.value: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

unittitle.value: East Timor and Indonesia Action Network Records

abstract.value: The East Timor Action Network (ETAN) was founded in November 1991 to support self-determination and human rights for the people of East Timor (Timor-Leste). While the national headquarters are in New York City, there are also some two dozen chapters around the United States. After East Timor achieved independence from Indonesia in 2002, ETAN changed (in 2005) its name (but not its acronym) to East Timor and Indonesia Action Network, to better reflect its goals of supporting human rights, justice, and democracy in both East Timor and Indonesia. The records contain clippings, U.S. Congressional documents, correspondence, financial records, press releases, subject files, and audiovisual materials, most relating to the operations of the national organization.

p.value: Published citations should take the following form: <lb/><lb/>Identification of item, date; Collection name; Collection number; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Materials donated by John M. Miller, National Coordinator for the East Timor and Indonesia Action Network (ETAN), in 2007. The accession number associated with this gift is 2007.011.
<list><item>For more information see the ETAN website (http://etan.org/etan/default.htm).</item></list>

The records contain clippings, correspondence, financial and administrative records, press releases, subject files, U.S. Congressional materials, and audiovisual materials, principally documenting the activity of the national organization. For more detailed information, see the descriptions in the container list, below. <emph render="bold">NOTE: This collection is housed offsite and advance notice is required for use.</emph>

corpname.value: East Timor and Indonesia Action Network/U.S.
